nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Get PDF or image
You need to create a new folder inside Google Drive for uploading your PDF and images.

Once you create a folder, you need to add your Google cloud user by going to Share -> Add user. The user email should be like: n8n-server@n8n-server-435232.iam.gserviceaccount.com

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Send to Openrouter
You need to set up an Openrouter account to use this. It sends the data to openrouter to extract text.

Use Header Auth. Name is "Authorization" and value is "Bearer {API token}".

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
## Vertex AI for image recogniztion
We send the photo to Vertex AI to extract text. You'll need to activate Vertex AI and add the correct rights to your Google cloud credentials. 
- Enable Vertex API
- Add vertex to user account

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Vertex A.I. extract text

messageValues.message: =You are given a screenshot of payment transactions. Read the image and export all the transactions as CSV. Add a column called category and based on the information assign a category name. Return only the CSV data starting with the header row.

nodes.notes: This chainLlm node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Extract text from PDF and image using Vertex AI (Gemini) into CSV

## Overview
Automated workflow: Extract text from PDF and image using Vertex AI (Gemini) into CSV. This workflow integrates 10 different services: convertToFile, stickyNote, httpRequest, googleDriveTrigger, lmChatGoogleGemini. It contains 27 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 27
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: âœ… Implemented
- **Security**: âœ… Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: âœ… Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Google Gemini Chat Model**: lmChatGoogleGemini
- **Get PDF or Images**: googleDriveTrigger
- **Route based on PDF or Image**: switch
- **Download PDF**: googleDrive
- **Download Image**: googleDrive
- **Extract data from PDF**: extractFromFile
- **Send data to A.I.**: httpRequest
- **Convert to CSV**: convertToFile
- **Upload to Google Drive**: googleDrive
- **Convert to CSV2**: convertToFile
- ... and 17 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
